bibl.title: A New Testimony to the Letter to the Hebrews.
Journal of Greco-Roman Christianity and Judaism

bibl.note: Fragment of a codex: parts of Heb. 2. 9-11 on the recto and Heb. 3. 3-6 on the verso. Sixth or seventh century.
PAPATHOMAS Amphilochios, A New Testimony to the Letter to the Hebrews.
Journal of Greco-Roman Christianity and Judaism 1 (2000) pp. 18-24, 2 figg. <http://divinity.mcmaster.ca/jgrchj/home>
